name: Spy Sisters
description:
It's 1984 once again. Agent Pumpkin "Spice" discovered a shocking truth - truth, that can change the world. Help her and her "sisters" to escape with secret documents in this fun and challenging platformer.

Developed by Vitaliy Tsytsyk, Julianna Chase, and Jacob Moore
